data.description: CompanyFederal Reserve Bank of DallasWe are dedicated to serving the public by promoting a strong financial system and a healthy economy for all. These efforts take a team of dedicated individuals doing many different jobs. Together we’re creating a workplace where talented people can thrive, and we welcome your unique background and perspective to help present the best possible solutions for our partners. Location: #LI-Onsite. If you need assistance or a reasonable accommodation, please notify your Talent Acquisition Consultant.ABOUT THE DALLAS FED:At the Dallas Fed we serve the public by partnering with communities and businesses, promoting jobs and stable prices, and keeping your money safe and available. We welcome different perspectives, ideas, and experiences. As part of the nation’s central bank, we are committed to improving the economy and our communities. Are you ready to make a difference? Learn more about the Dallas Fed: www.dallasfed.org/fed ABOUT THE INTERNSHIP PROGRAM:We offer paid, full-time summer internships for many majors, with fulfilling work and opportunities to grow. To help launch your career, we provide dedicated staff mentors. You’ll also learn from senior leaders and industry experts. As part of the Federal Reserve System, you’ll be connected to a professional network that spans the nation. You will begin in early June 2026 and will be based in the [Insert location] office. Learn more about our internship program: www.dallasfed.org/internshipsABOUT YOUR TEAM:Candidate will work on fast pace collaborative environment within ITS department. The team is formed of standard Agile Scrum team including Software Engineers, Quality Assurance, Product Owner, Product Manager, and Scrum Master. The delivery team is responsible for deliverables of software enhancements and maintenance of the application.WHAT YOU’LL DO:Work with team on developing enhancements in Appian platformWork with team to investigate any production defects and provide fixRefine requirements, provide design recommendation, and implement solutions in low code platformDocuments new systems or enhancements to existing systems.Works within standardized procedures and practices to achieve objectives and meet deadlines. Accountable for own work. Assist business and leadership with reportingWHAT YOU BRING:Preferred Degrees/Major: Computer Science, Management information system, or technical Bachelors or Masters degreeSoftware Skills: Low code platform, Appian experience is a plus, SQL, Java, Python, Git, Gitlab, Tableau, JIRAUnderstands Software Development life cycle in AGILE and SAFeUnderstands fundamental theories, principles, and concept of Software Development Provides Informative, timely, and clear information; asks questions and checks for understanding Self Starter and curiosity to learn and deliver on commitments NOTES: If you need special accommodations during your interview process, please notify your Talent Acquisition Consultant.We are proud to be an equal opportunity employerThis position will be posted for 10 business days from the post date.Full Time / Part TimeFull timeRegular / TemporaryTemporaryJob Exempt (Yes / No)YesJob CategoryInformation Technology Family GroupWork ShiftFirst (United States of America)The Federal Reserve Banks are committed to equal employment opportunity for employees and job applicants in compliance with applicable law and to an environment where employees are valued for their differences.Always verify and apply to jobs on Federal Reserve System Careers (https://rb.wd5.myworkdayjobs.com/FRS) or through verified Federal Reserve Bank social media channels.Privacy Notice
requirements: Refine requirements, provide design recommendation, and implement solutions in low code platform
Preferred Degrees/Major:  Computer Science, Management information system, or technical Bachelors or Masters degree
responsibilities: Work with team on developing enhancements in Appian platform
Understands Software Development life cycle in AGILE and SAFe
Understands fundamental theories, principles, and concept of Software Development
